definition: to refuse to meet sb/to avoid sb
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Red fly from fear him, so avoid don't meet again.
sentences.chinese: 赤飛從小怕他，故避不見面。
